app_detail:
Welcome to Chrome Beta for Android!

Chrome Beta works just like Chrome - with new features we are testing out.

• Preview the latest features: Try out the newest features. (Sometimes these may be a little rough around the edges.)
• Give early feedback: Let us know what you think and help make Chrome for Android a better browser.

You can install Chrome Beta alongside your current version of Chrome for Android.

Permission Notice
• Location: Needed to personalize websites and search suggestions based on your device’s location, and to support Bluetooth discovery
• Accounts: Needed to support Chrome sign-in and sync
• Camera: Needed to upload images from the camera to websites and to support websites that use WebRTC, such as video conferencing apps
• Microphone: Needed to search by voice and to support websites that use WebRTC, such as video conferencing apps
• External Storage: Needed to save downloads and open links to local files
